description.value: Codes for the five race categories - 'American Indian' or 'Alaska Native','Asian', 'Black or African American', 'Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander', and 'White' - as defined by the [OMB Standards for Maintaining, Collecting, and Presenting Federal Data on Race and Ethnicity, Statistical Policy Directive No. 15, as revised, October 30, 1997](https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-1997-10-30/pdf/97-28653.pdf). This value set was created (as opposed to using the US Core OMB Race Categories value set) to deliberately prevent inclusion of null flavors.

display.value: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
